bio.name: Jack Smith
bio.title: AI + Graphics Enthusiast
bio.description: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about creating immersive digital experiences. With expertise in AI integration, modern web technologies, and creative design, I build applications that bridge the gap between functionality and artistry.

projects.title: AI-Powered Chat Platform
projects.description: Real-time chat application with AI assistant integration, supporting voice messages and document analysis.

projects.title: Interactive 3D Portfolio
projects.description: Immersive portfolio experience built with Three.js, featuring animated 3D models and particle systems.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Dynamic dashboard for visualizing complex datasets with interactive charts and real-time updates.

experience.description: Leading development of AI-integrated web applications, mentoring junior developers, and architecting scalable solutions.
Specialized in creating interactive user experiences and implementing complex animations for high-profile clients.
